short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the pleasure of arranging your vacations with MyTravelTab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are a fan of traveling but you are not inspired? We got you covered! 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Bee Hive extension and setting Chrome New Tab Search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in EULA https://mytraveltab.com/eula.html and Privacy Policy https://mytraveltab.com/privacy-policy.html

MyTravel Tab is an extension that will fill you with ideas for your next destination but, besides of that, it will help you focus and become better you every single day! âœ¨

A different backdrop will surface every time you open a new tab, and you will be amazed! We included those images to help you plan your next vacation. Seeing these photos on a regular basis will not only remind you of where you want to go next, but it will also keep you energetic and assist you in completing your daily duties.

Together with these amazing backgrounds, we implemented a couple of features to help you organize your time. 
The first one will let you see and change all wallpapers whenever you want. It means that you do not have to open a new tab every time you want different inspiration. You can just click on the small earth logo in the top left corner and enjoy the view! ğŸŒ

We included a clock in the centre of the screen, right beneath our logo, to help you organize your work and time. As a result, you will always be on time, which is essential. âŒ›

Once an idea occur on your mind, feel free to use our Search Box. ğŸ”

Don't be surprised if the weather changes these days. You may always check the weather forecast(in the top right corner)for your specific location and plan accordingly.  ğŸŒ„ğŸŒ¡â˜ï¸ï¸ğŸŒ

This one will take your breath away! Once you've decided on a destination, you can use our Google Maps tool to view the actual location, wander about the area, and get a feel for it before you go. ğŸ—ºï¸

You can quickly uninstall (but we do would not recommend because it is a masterpiece ğŸ˜) the extension by following these instructions:

II. Click on the exact extension
